name: WordoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Check in each day for a new English vocabulary word! Impress your friends and family! Not only will you hear the definition, but you'll hear it used in a sentence, too.

Have a suggestion, feedback, or question? Having issues with the skill? Did we get something wrong? We'd love to hear from you! Please reach out to our support team: 
WordOfTheDaySkill@gmail.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
